alfredsnippet.snippet:
# Mac Terminal
# PC
$mediaPath = "G:\Media\VR\Batch"
Get-ChildItem $mediaPath -Filter *.mp4 | ForEach-Object {
    $mediaName = $_.FullName -replace "\.[^.]*$",""
    ffmpeg -i "$mediaName.mp4" `
    -c:v libx265 -crf 21 -preset medium `
    -c:a aac `
    -b:a 128k `
    -pix_fmt yuv420p10le `
    -metadata "stereo_mode=left_right"  `
    -movflags +faststart `
    "$mediaName-HEVC.mp4" `
} 


# MacOs
mediaPath="/Volumes/_MacOS Batch"
for f in $mediaPath/*.mp4; do
  name="${f%.mp4}"
  ffmpeg -i "$f"  \
    -c:v libx265 -crf 21 -preset medium \
    -c:a aac -b:a 128k \
    -pix_fmt yuv420p10le \
    -metadata "stereo_mode=left_right" \
    -movflags +faststart \
    "${name}-HEVC.mp4"
done

# If you don't need to scale the videos and want to keep them at their original resolution
# removing this line between '-pix_fmt' and '-movflags'
# -vf "scale=3024:1512:flags=lanczos"
alfredsnippet.name: Batch to HEVC(libx265)
